title: Highest Short-term Debt Ratio
description: In 2023, Zimbabwe had the highest short-term debt as a percentage of total reserves in the world, reaching 3409.70%.

title: Fastest Broad Money Growth
description: Zimbabwe experienced the fastest broad money growth in the world in 2023, with an annual increase of 708.93%.

title: Highest Inflation Rate
description: In 2023, Zimbabwe had the highest inflation rate in the world, with the GDP deflator increasing by 921.54%.

title: Highest Lending Interest Rate
description: Zimbabwe had the highest lending interest rate globally in 2023, at 170.29%.

title: Largest Interest Rate Spread
description: In 2023, Zimbabwe had the largest interest rate spread in the world, with a difference of 107.47% between lending and deposit rates.

title: Lowest Real Interest Rate
description: Zimbabwe had the lowest real interest rate in the world in 2023, at -73.54%.

title: Highest Growth in Claims on Domestic Economy
description: In 2023, Zimbabwe had the highest growth in claims on other sectors of the domestic economy, at 453.95% of broad money.

title: Highest Growth in Claims on Private Sector
description: Zimbabwe experienced the highest growth in claims on the private sector in 2023, with an increase of 425.49% of broad money.

title: Lowest Net Foreign Assets
description: In 2023, Zimbabwe had the lowest net foreign assets globally, amounting to -18,861,835,122,967.90 LCU.
